name: Block Assault
description:
Block Assault is a simplistic application where everything is a block. You can build your base using more blocks, and destroy the opposing base using even more blocks.

 The goal is to defend against enemy assaults and fight back. Upgrade and sell your blocks to get an advantage over the AI. 

The AI can be changed from difficulty 1-10. This is a local application, and because of that, Block Assault can be played regardless of an internet connection.

Developer's Site
